channel.title: Error connecting to Server Please try a different world(TorvaPkz Source)
channel.description: I am trying to run the client that came with the package but when i go to log in it keeps saying "error connecting to server please try switching worlds". This is my 4 time downloading a new source and they all keep saying this. I am portfowarded and everything is right. If anyone has teamviewer or who can help please reply on the forum

item.title: Error connecting to Server Please try a different world(TorvaPkz Source)
item.dc:creator: @bibbobbib bibbobbib
item.description:
@bibbobbib wrote:

did u portforward with uttorent? or whatever it is u need to change the port to something random like 65334 or sommit then login then change port back to what it was i have this problem alot

Read full topic
